content: purl odd number of round 4 knit and do raglan increases as above stitches in each round 5 purl section next you will start seed stitch and continue with seed stitch raglan increases from the beginning of the round *k1 p1* repeat ** to last stitch k1 round 6 kfb * k1 p1 * repeat ** to 2 stitches before the marker k1 pfkb slipm repeat 4 times using 4 mm needles cast on round 7 k1 * k1 p1 * repeat * to 2 stitch before the 60 68 76 84 92 marker k2 slipm repeat 4 times 100 108 sts place marker and round 8 kfb * p1 k1 * repeat * to 2 stitches before join for knitting in the marker p1 kfb repeat 4 times the round be round 9 k1 * p1 k1 * repeat to marker repeat 4 careful not to twist times your stitches repeat rnds 6 to 9 till you have 29 31 33 35 37 41 45 sts in each section ending with either round 7 or 9 round 1 purl and place markers every 15 17 19 21 23 25 27 sts © elena nodel 2009 shades of summer dress - 4 - markers divide the bodice into four sections two of seed stitch pattern going which does require an the sections are going to form armholes sections 1 odd number of stitches and 3 and the other two are going to be front and back of the bodice sections 2 and 4 you should have 73 79 91 101 109 117 125 sts total at this point round a work increase round as in existing pattern round b from the beginning of the round knit the bodice in seed stitch for about 1 5 inches section 1 purl size 3-6 months and 6-12 months 2 inches for size section 2 work in established seed stitch 1-2t 2-3t and 3-4t and 2 5 inches for all other sizes section 3 purl section 4 work in established seed stitch the following rounds are worked as follows rnds 1 3 purl repeat rnds a and b one more time for sizes 3-6 round 2 knit months and 6-12 months and two more times for all round 4 knit and the other seizes at this point each section should evenly increase by have 33 35 39 41 43 47 51 sts 5 5 5 1 5 3 1 sts total number of next round stitches 78 84 96 section 1 bind off purlwise 102 114 120 126 section 2 work in established seed stitch section 3 bind off purlwise rnds 5 6 8 knit section 4 work in established seed stitch rnds 7 9 purl cast on 3 4 6 9 11 11 11 sts seed stitch across 33 note rnds 4-6 is a 35 39 41 43 47 51 sts cast on 4 5 7 10 12 12 place where you 12 sts then seed stitch across next set of 33 35
